General.Name: Sumou Real Estate Company JSCC
General.Description: Sumou Real Estate Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction of residential and non-residential properties in Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Real Estate Project Development; Real Estate Project Management; and Investments. It constructs schools, hospitals, hotels, airports, and prefabricated building on sites; renovates residential and non-residential buildings; and purchases and sells land and real estate properties. The company also acts as a sales agent in food and beverages. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia. Sumou Real Estate Company is a subsidiary of Sumou Holding Company.
